body:
Fixes a bug reported by @nicholas-sly on slack.

The PrgEnv-* modules on Cray CNL systems seem to fail to load if CRAY_LD_LIBRARY_PATH is unset.

This PR expands the scope of OSs for which CRAY_LD_LIBRARY_PATH is not cleaned, from CNL5 to the entire CNL* series.
title: cray module do not work without CRAY_LD_LIBRARY_PATH
